00047 EGS_NDGeometry::EGS_NDGeometry(int ng, EGS_BaseGeometry **G,
00048                                const string &Name, bool O) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), N(ng), ortho(O) {
00049     nreg = 1;
00050     setup();
00051     for (int j=0; j<N; j++) {
00052         g[j] = G[j];
00053         n[j] = nreg;
00054         nreg *= g[j]->regions();
00055         if (!g[j]->isConvex()) {
00056             is_convex = false;
00057         }
00058     }
00059     n[N] = nreg;
00060 }
00061 
00062 EGS_NDGeometry::EGS_NDGeometry(vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> &G,
00063                                const string &Name, bool O) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), N(G.size()), ortho(O) {
00064     nreg = 1;
00065     setup();
00066     for (int j=0; j<N; j++) {
00067         g[j] = G[j];
00068         n[j] = nreg;
00069         nreg *= g[j]->regions();
00070         if (!g[j]->isConvex()) {
00071             is_convex = false;
00072         }
00073     }
00074     n[N] = nreg;
00075 }
00076 
00077 EGS_NDGeometry::~EGS_NDGeometry() {
00078     for (int j=0; j<N; j++) {
00079         int ref = g[j]->deref();
00080         if (!ref) {
00081             delete g[j];
00082         }
00083     }
00084     delete [] n;
00085     delete [] g;
00086 }
00087 
00088 void EGS_NDGeometry::setup() {
00089     n = new int [N+1];
00090     g = new EGS_BaseGeometry* [N];
00091 }
00092 
00093 void EGS_NDGeometry::printInfo() const {
00094     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00095     egsInformation(" number of dimensions = %d\n",N);
00096     for (int j=0; j<N; j++)
00097         egsInformation(" dimension %d = %s (type %s)\n",
00098                        j+1,g[j]->getName().c_str(),g[j]->getType().c_str());
00099     egsInformation(
00100         "=======================================================\n");
00101 }

00103 void EGS_NDGeometry::setMedia(EGS_Input *input, int nmed, const int *mind) {
00104     EGS_Input *i;
00105     med = mind[0];
00106     while ((i = input->takeInputItem("set medium"))) {
00107         vector<int> inp;
00108         int err = i->getInput("set medium",inp);
00109         delete i;
00110         if (!err) {
00111             if (inp.size() == 2) {
00112                 setMedium(inp[0],inp[0],mind[inp[1]]);
00113             }
00114             else if (inp.size() == 3) {
00115                 setMedium(inp[0],inp[1],mind[inp[2]]);
00116             }
00117             else if (inp.size() == 4) setMedium(inp[0],inp[1],mind[inp[2]],
00118                                                     inp[3]);
00119             else if (inp.size() == 2*N+1) {
00120                 setM(0,0,inp,inp[2*N]);
00121             }
00122             else egsWarning("EGS_NDGeometry::setMedia(): found %dinputs\n"
00123                                 "in a 'set medium' input. 2, 3, 4, or %d are allowed\n",2*N+1);
00124         }
00125         else egsWarning("EGS_NDGeometry::setMedia(): wrong 'set medium'"
00126                             " input\n");
00127     }
00128 }
00129 
00130 void EGS_NDGeometry::setM(int ibase, int idim,
00131                           const vector<int> &ranges, int medium) {
00132     int istart = ranges[2*idim], iend = ranges[2*idim+1];
00133     if (istart < 0) {
00134         istart = 0;
00135     }
00136     int ndim = n[idim+1];
00137     for (int i=0; i<=idim; i++) {
00138         ndim /= n[i];
00139     }
00140     if (iend > ndim) {
00141         iend = ndim;
00142     }
00143     if (idim < N-1) for (int j=istart; j<iend; j++) {
00144             setM(ibase+j*n[idim],idim+1,ranges,medium);
00145         }
00146     else for (int j=istart; j<iend; j++) {
00147             setMedium(ibase+j*n[idim],ibase+j*n[idim]+1,medium);
00148         }
00149 }

00153 string EGS_XYZGeometry::type = "EGS_XYZGeometry";
00154 
00155 EGS_XYZGeometry::EGS_XYZGeometry(EGS_PlanesX *Xp, EGS_PlanesY *Yp,
00156                                  EGS_PlanesZ *Zp, const string &Name) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name),
00157     xp(Xp), yp(Yp), zp(Zp) {
00158     nx = xp->regions();
00159     ny = yp->regions();
00160     nz = zp->regions();
00161     nxy = nx*ny;
00162     nreg = nxy*nz;
00163     xp->ref();
00164     yp->ref();
00165     zp->ref();
00166     xpos = xp->getPositions();
00167     ypos = yp->getPositions();
00168     zpos = zp->getPositions();
00169 }
00170 
00171 EGS_XYZGeometry::~EGS_XYZGeometry() {
00172     if (!xp->deref()) {
00173         delete xp;
00174     }
00175     if (!yp->deref()) {
00176         delete yp;
00177     }
00178     if (!zp->deref()) {
00179         delete zp;
00180     }
00181 }

00183 void EGS_XYZGeometry::printInfo() const {
00184     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00185     xp->printInfo();
00186     yp->printInfo();
00187     zp->printInfo();
00188     egsInformation(
00189         "=======================================================\n");
00190 }

00192 void EGS_XYZGeometry::setMedia(EGS_Input *input, int nmed, const int *mind) {
00193     EGS_Input *i;
00194     med = mind[0];
00195     while ((i = input->takeInputItem("set medium"))) {
00196         vector<int> inp;
00197         int err = i->getInput("set medium",inp);
00198         delete i;
00199         if (!err) {
00200             if (inp.size() == 2) {
00201                 setMedium(inp[0],inp[0],mind[inp[1]]);
00202             }
00203             else if (inp.size() == 3) {
00204                 setMedium(inp[0],inp[1],mind[inp[2]]);
00205             }
00206             else if (inp.size() == 4) setMedium(inp[0],inp[1],mind[inp[2]],
00207                                                     inp[3]);
00208             else if (inp.size() == 7) {
00209                 int is = inp[0], ie = inp[1];
00210                 if (is < 0) {
00211                     is = 0;
00212                 }
00213                 if (ie > nx-1) {
00214                     ie = nx-1;
00215                 }
00216                 int js = inp[2], je = inp[3];
00217                 if (js < 0) {
00218                     js = 0;
00219                 }
00220                 if (je > nxy/nx-1) {
00221                     je = nxy/nx-1;
00222                 }
00223                 int ks = inp[4], ke = inp[5];
00224                 if (ks < 0) {
00225                     ks = 0;
00226                 }
00227                 if (ke > nreg/nxy-1) {
00228                     ke = nreg/nxy-1;
00229                 }
00230                 //egsInformation("setting medium to %d between %d %d %d %d "
00231                 //        "%d %d\n",mind[inp[6]],is,ie,js,je,ks,ke);
00232                 for (int i=is; i<=ie; i++) {
00233                     for (int j=js; j<=je; j++) {
00234                         for (int k=ks; k<=ke; k++) {
00235                             int ireg = i + j*nx + k*nxy;
00236                             //egsWarning("set: %d %d %d %d   %d\n",
00237                             //        i,j,k,ireg,mind[inp[6]]);
00238                             setMedium(ireg,ireg,mind[inp[6]]);
00239                         }
00240                     }
00241                 }
00242             }
00243             else if (inp.size() == 10) {
00244                 int is = inp[0], ie = inp[1], idelta = inp[2];
00245                 if (is < 0) {
00246                     is = 0;
00247                 }
00248                 if (ie > nx-1) {
00249                     ie = nx-1;
00250                 }
00251                 if (idelta <= 0) {
00252                     idelta = 1;
00253                 }
00254                 int js = inp[3], je = inp[4], jdelta = inp[5];
00255                 if (js < 0) {
00256                     js = 0;
00257                 }
00258                 if (je > nxy/nx-1) {
00259                     je = nxy/nx-1;
00260                 }
00261                 if (jdelta <= 0) {
00262                     jdelta = 1;
00263                 }
00264                 int ks = inp[6], ke = inp[7], kdelta = inp[8];
00265                 if (ks < 0) {
00266                     ks = 0;
00267                 }
00268                 if (ke > nreg/nxy-1) {
00269                     ke = nreg/nxy-1;
00270                 }
00271                 if (kdelta <= 0) {
00272                     kdelta = 1;
00273                 }
00274                 //egsInformation("setting medium to %d between %d %d %d %d "
00275                 //        "%d %d\n",mind[inp[6]],is,ie,js,je,ks,ke);
00276                 for (int i=is; i<=ie; i+=idelta) {
00277                     for (int j=js; j<=je; j+=jdelta) {
00278                         for (int k=ks; k<=ke; k+=kdelta) {
00279                             int ireg = i + j*nx + k*nxy;
00280                             //egsWarning("set: %d %d %d %d   %d\n",
00281                             //        i,j,k,ireg,mind[inp[6]]);
00282                             setMedium(ireg,ireg,mind[inp[9]]);
00283                         }
00284                     }
00285                 }
00286             }
00287             else egsWarning("EGS_XYZGeometry::setMedia(): found %dinputs\n"
00288                                 "in a 'set medium' input. 2, 3, 4, 7, or 10 are allowed\n");
00289         }
00290         else egsWarning("EGS_XYZGeometry::setMedia(): wrong 'set medium'"
00291                             " input\n");
00292     }
00293 }
00294 
00295 EGS_XYZGeometry *EGS_XYZGeometry::constructGeometry(const char *dens_file,
00296         const char *ramp_file, int dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile) {
00297     const static char *func = "EGS_XYZGeometry::constructGeometry";
00298     if (!dens_file || !ramp_file) {
00299         return 0;
00300     }
00301     ifstream ramp(ramp_file);
00302     if (!ramp) {
00303         egsWarning("%s: failed to open CT ramp file %s\n",func,ramp_file);
00304         return 0;
00305     }
00306     vector<string> med_names;
00307     vector<EGS_Float> rho_min,rho_max,rho_def;
00308 
00309     if (dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile == 2) {
00310         // interfile format of data
00311         int meds;
00312         ramp >> meds;
00313         for (int i=0; i < meds; i++) {
00314             string medname;
00315             EGS_Float rmin,rmax,rdef;
00316             ramp >> rmin >> rmax >> medname;
00317             rdef=(rmin+rmax) / 2.0; // is this correct definition of rdef ??
00318             if (ramp.eof() || ramp.fail() || !ramp.good()) {
00319                 break;
00320             }
00321             egsInformation("Using medium %s for rho=%g...%g\n",medname.c_str(),
00322                            rmin,rmax);
00323             med_names.push_back(medname);
00324             rho_min.push_back(rmin);
00325             rho_max.push_back(rmax+1);
00326             rho_def.push_back(rdef);
00327         }
00328     }
00329     else while (1) {
00330             // other format of data
00331             string medname;
00332             EGS_Float rmin,rmax,rdef;
00333             ramp >> medname >> rmin >> rmax >> rdef;
00334             if (ramp.eof() || ramp.fail() || !ramp.good()) {
00335                 break;
00336             }
00337             egsInformation("Using medium %s for rho=%g...%g\n",medname.c_str(),
00338                            rmin,rmax);
00339             med_names.push_back(medname);
00340             rho_min.push_back(rmin);
00341             rho_max.push_back(rmax);
00342             rho_def.push_back(rdef);
00343         }
00344     if (med_names.size() < 1) {
00345         egsWarning("%s: no media defined in the CT ramp "
00346                    "file %s!\n",func,ramp_file);
00347         return 0;
00348     }
00349     int Nx, Ny, Nz;
00350     EGS_Float *xx, *yy, *zz;
00351     float *rho;
00352     if (dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile == 0) {
00353         int my_endian = egsGetEndian();
00354         if (my_endian < 0) egsFatal("%s: machine has an unknown"
00355                                         " endianess!\n",func);
00356         ifstream dens(dens_file,ios::binary);
00357         if (!dens) {
00358             egsWarning("%s: failed to open density matrix file "
00359                        "%s\n",func,dens_file);
00360             return 0;
00361         }
00362         char their_endian;
00363         dens.read(&their_endian,1);
00364         if (their_endian != 0 && their_endian != 1)
00365             egsFatal("%s: density data created on a machine with"
00366                      " unknown endianess!\n",func);
00367         bool swap = my_endian != their_endian;
00368         dens.read((char *) &Nx,sizeof(int));
00369         if (swap) {
00370             egsSwapBytes(&Nx);
00371         }
00372         dens.read((char *) &Ny,sizeof(int));
00373         if (swap) {
00374             egsSwapBytes(&Ny);
00375         }
00376         dens.read((char *) &Nz,sizeof(int));
00377         if (swap) {
00378             egsSwapBytes(&Nz);
00379         }
00380         if (Nx < 1 || Ny < 1 || Nz < 1) {
00381             egsWarning("%s: invalid density matrix file: "
00382                        " Nx=%d Ny=%d Nz=%d\n",func,Nx,Ny,Nz);
00383             return 0;
00384         }
00385         float *x = new float [Nx+1];
00386         float *y = new float [Ny+1];
00387         float *z = new float [Nz+1];
00388         dens.read((char *)x, (Nx+1)*sizeof(float));
00389         if (dens.eof() || dens.fail() || !dens.good()) {
00390             egsWarning("%s: error while reading %d x-planes from"
00391                        " file %s\n",func,Nx+1,dens_file);
00392             delete [] x;
00393             delete [] y;
00394             delete [] z;
00395             return 0;
00396         }
00397         dens.read((char *)y, (Ny+1)*sizeof(float));
00398         if (dens.eof() || dens.fail() || !dens.good()) {
00399             egsWarning("%s: error while reading %d y-planes from"
00400                        " file %s\n",func,Ny+1,dens_file);
00401             delete [] x;
00402             delete [] y;
00403             delete [] z;
00404             return 0;
00405         }
00406         dens.read((char *)z, (Nz+1)*sizeof(float));
00407         if (dens.eof() || dens.fail() || !dens.good()) {
00408             egsWarning("%s: error while reading %d z-planes from"
00409                        " file %s\n",func,Nz+1,dens_file);
00410             delete [] x;
00411             delete [] y;
00412             delete [] z;
00413             return 0;
00414         }
00415         if (swap) {
00416             int j;
00417             for (j=0; j<Nx; j++) {
00418                 egsSwapBytes(&x[j]);
00419             }
00420             for (j=0; j<Ny; j++) {
00421                 egsSwapBytes(&y[j]);
00422             }
00423             for (j=0; j<Nz; j++) {
00424                 egsSwapBytes(&z[j]);
00425             }
00426         }
00427         {
00428             int j;
00429             xx = new EGS_Float [Nx+1];
00430             for (j=0; j<=Nx; j++) {
00431                 xx[j] = x[j];
00432             }
00433             yy = new EGS_Float [Ny+1];
00434             for (j=0; j<=Ny; j++) {
00435                 yy[j] = y[j];
00436             }
00437             zz = new EGS_Float [Nz+1];
00438             for (j=0; j<=Nz; j++) {
00439                 zz[j] = z[j];
00440             }
00441             delete [] x;
00442             delete [] y;
00443             delete [] z;
00444         }
00445         rho = new float [Nx*Ny*Nz];
00446         dens.read((char *)rho, Nx*Ny*Nz*sizeof(float));
00447         if (dens.fail()) {
00448             egsWarning("%s: failed reading mass densities from density matrux file\n",func);
00449             delete [] rho;
00450             delete [] xx;
00451             delete [] yy;
00452             delete [] zz;
00453             return 0;
00454         }
00455         if (swap) {
00456             for (int j=0; j<Nx*Ny*Nz; j++) {
00457                 egsSwapBytes(&rho[j]);
00458             }
00459         }
00460     }
00461     else if (dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile == 2) {
00462         ifstream h_file(dens_file);
00463         if (!h_file) {
00464             egsWarning("%s: failed to open the interfile header %s\n",func,dens_file);
00465             return 0;
00466         }
00467         string data_file("");
00468         int data_type = -1;
00469         float scale_x=0.0, scale_y=0.0, scale_z=0.0;
00470         while (1) {
00471             string line, key, value;
00472             size_t pos;
00473             getline(h_file, line);
00474             if (h_file.eof() || h_file.fail() || !h_file.good()) {
00475                 break;
00476             }
00477 
00478             pos = line.find(":=");
00479             if (pos == string::npos) {
00480                 continue;
00481             }
00482             key = line.substr(0, int(pos));
00483             value = line.substr(int(pos)+2);
00484             while ((key[0] == '!') || (key[0] == ' ')) {
00485                 key.erase(0,1);
00486             }
00487             while (key[key.length()-1] == ' ') {
00488                 key.erase(key.length()-1, 1);
00489             }
00490             while (value[0] == ' ') {
00491                 value.erase(0,1);
00492             }
00493             while (value[value.length()-1] == ' ') {
00494                 value.erase(value.length()-1, 1);
00495             }
00496 
00497             if (key ==  "matrix size [1]") {
00498                 sscanf(value.c_str(), "%u", &Nx);
00499             }
00500             else if (key ==  "matrix size [2]") {
00501                 sscanf(value.c_str(), "%u", &Ny);
00502             }
00503             else if ((key ==  "number of slices") || (key ==  "number of images")) {
00504                 sscanf(value.c_str(), "%u", &Nz);
00505             }
00506             else if (key ==  "scaling factor (mm/pixel) [1]") {
00507                 sscanf(value.c_str(), "%f", &scale_x);
00508             }
00509             else if (key ==  "scaling factor (mm/pixel) [2]") {
00510                 sscanf(value.c_str(), "%f", &scale_y);
00511             }
00512             else if (key ==  "slice thickness (pixels)") {
00513                 sscanf(value.c_str(), "%f", &scale_z);    // ????????????????
00514             }
00515             else if (key ==  "name of data file") {
00516                 data_file = value;
00517             }
00518             else if (key ==  "number format") {
00519                 if ((value == "float") || (value == "FLOAT")) {
00520                     data_type = 0;
00521                 }
00522                 else if ((value == "unsigned integer") || (value == "UNSIGNED INTEGER")) {
00523                     data_type = 1;
00524                 }
00525                 else {
00526                     egsWarning("%s: unrecognised 'number format' type: %s \n",func,value.c_str());
00527                 }
00528             }
00529         }
00530         if (Nx < 1 || Ny < 1 || Nz < 1 || scale_x <= 0.0 || scale_y <= 0.0 || scale_z <= 0.0 || data_file == "" || data_type == -1) {
00531             egsWarning("%s: invalid interfile header information: "
00532                        "Nx=%d Ny=%d Nz=%d scale_x=%f scale_y=%f scale_z=%f "
00533                        "data_file='%s' number_format=%d\n",func,Nx,Ny,Nz,scale_x,scale_y,scale_z,data_file.c_str(),data_type);
00534             return 0;
00535         }
00536         ifstream i_file(data_file.c_str(),ios::binary);
00537         if (!i_file) {
00538             egsWarning("%s: failed to open interfile data "
00539                        "%s\n",func,data_file.c_str());
00540             return 0;
00541         }
00542         scale_x /= 10.0;
00543         scale_y /= 10.0;
00544         scale_z /= 10.0; // convert to cm
00545         {
00546             int j;
00547             xx = new EGS_Float [Nx+1];
00548             for (j=0; j<=Nx; j++) {
00549                 xx[j] = -(float)Nx*scale_x/2.0 + j*scale_x;
00550             }
00551             yy = new EGS_Float [Ny+1];
00552             for (j=0; j<=Ny; j++) {
00553                 yy[j] = -(float)Ny*scale_y/2.0 + j*scale_y;
00554             }
00555             zz = new EGS_Float [Nz+1];
00556             for (j=0; j<=Nz; j++) {
00557                 zz[j] = -(float)Nz*scale_z/2.0 + j*scale_z;
00558             }
00559         }
00560         rho = new float [Nx*Ny*Nz];
00561         if (data_type == 0) {
00562             i_file.read((char *)rho, Nx*Ny*Nz*sizeof(float));
00563         }
00564         else {
00565             unsigned short int *rho_tmp = new unsigned short int [Nx*Ny*Nz];
00566             i_file.read((char *)rho_tmp, (Nx*Ny*Nz)*sizeof(unsigned short int));
00567             for (int cc = 0; cc<Nx*Ny*Nz; cc++) {
00568                 rho[cc] = (float)(rho_tmp[cc]);
00569             }
00570             delete [] rho_tmp;
00571         }
00572         if (i_file.fail()) {
00573             egsWarning("%s: failed reading interfile data\n",func);
00574             delete [] rho;
00575             delete [] xx;
00576             delete [] yy;
00577             delete [] zz;
00578             return 0;
00579         }
00580     }
00581     else {
00582         ifstream data(dens_file);
00583         if (!data) {
00584             egsWarning("%s: failed to open .egsphant file %s\n",func,dens_file);
00585             return 0;
00586         }
00587         int nmed;
00588         data >> nmed;
00589         if (data.fail()) {
00590             egsWarning("%s: failed reading number of media\n",func);
00591             return 0;
00592         }
00593         char buf [1024];
00594         int imed;
00595         data.getline(buf,1023);
00596         for (imed=0; imed<nmed; ++imed) {
00597             data.getline(buf,1023);
00598             if (data.fail()) {
00599                 egsWarning("%s: failed reading medium name for %d'th medium\n",func,imed+1);
00600             }
00601             //egsInformation("Got line <%s>\n",buf);
00602         }
00603         // ignore estepe
00604         EGS_Float dum;
00605         for (imed=0; imed<nmed; ++imed) {
00606             data >> dum;
00607         }
00608         data >> Nx >> Ny >> Nz;
00609         if (data.fail()) {
00610             egsWarning("%s: failed reading number of voxels\n",func);
00611             return 0;
00612         }
00613         xx = new EGS_Float [Nx+1];
00614         yy = new EGS_Float [Ny+1];
00615         zz = new EGS_Float [Nz+1];
00616         int j;
00617         for (j=0; j<=Nx; ++j) {
00618             data >> xx[j];
00619         }
00620         if (data.fail()) {
00621             egsWarning("%s: failed reading x-planes\n",func);
00622             delete [] xx;
00623             delete [] yy;
00624             delete [] zz;
00625             return 0;
00626         }
00627         for (j=0; j<=Ny; ++j) {
00628             data >> yy[j];
00629         }
00630         if (data.fail()) {
00631             egsWarning("%s: failed reading y-planes\n",func);
00632             delete [] xx;
00633             delete [] yy;
00634             delete [] zz;
00635             return 0;
00636         }
00637         for (j=0; j<=Nz; ++j) {
00638             data >> zz[j];
00639         }
00640         if (data.fail()) {
00641             egsWarning("%s: failed reading z-planes\n",func);
00642             delete [] xx;
00643             delete [] yy;
00644             delete [] zz;
00645             return 0;
00646         }
00647         int nr = Nx*Ny*Nz;
00648         int med;
00649         //for(j=0; j<nr; ++j) data >> med;
00650         data.getline(buf,1023);
00651         for (int iz=0; iz<Nz; ++iz) {
00652             for (int iy=0; iy<Ny; ++iy) {
00653                 data.getline(buf,1023);
00654             }
00655             data.getline(buf,1023);
00656         }
00657         if (data.fail()) {
00658             egsWarning("%s: failed reading media indeces matrix\n",func);
00659             delete [] xx;
00660             delete [] yy;
00661             delete [] zz;
00662             return 0;
00663         }
00664         rho = new float [nr];
00665         for (j=0; j<nr; ++j) {
00666             data >> rho[j];
00667         }
00668         if (data.fail()) {
00669             egsWarning("%s: failed reading mass density matrix\n",func);
00670             delete [] xx;
00671             delete [] yy;
00672             delete [] zz;
00673             delete [] rho;
00674             return 0;
00675         }
00676     }
00677     EGS_PlanesX *xp = new EGS_PlanesX(Nx+1,xx,"",EGS_XProjector("x-planes"));
00678     EGS_PlanesY *yp = new EGS_PlanesY(Ny+1,yy,"",EGS_YProjector("y-planes"));
00679     EGS_PlanesZ *zp = new EGS_PlanesZ(Nz+1,zz,"",EGS_ZProjector("z-planes"));
00680     EGS_XYZGeometry *result = new EGS_XYZGeometry(xp,yp,zp);
00681     EGS_Float rhomin=1e30,rhomax=0;
00682     int j;
00683     for (j=0; j<Nx*Ny*Nz; j++) {
00684         if (rho[j] > rhomax) {
00685             rhomax = rho[j];
00686         }
00687         if (rho[j] < rhomin) {
00688             rhomin = rho[j];
00689         }
00690     }
00691     egsInformation("Min. density found: %g\n",rhomin);
00692     egsInformation("Max. density found: %g\n",rhomax);
00693     int nmed = med_names.size();
00694     int *imed = new int [nmed];
00695     for (j=0; j<nmed; j++) {
00696         imed[j] = -2;
00697     }
00698     for (j=0; j<Nx*Ny*Nz; j++) {
00699         int i;
00700         for (i=0; i<nmed; i++) {
00701             if (rho[j] >= rho_min[i] && rho[j] < rho_max[i]) {
00702                 break;
00703             }
00704         }
00705         if (i >= nmed) {
00706             egsWarning("%s: no material defined for density %g, leaving voxel %d"
00707                        " as vacuum\n",func,rho[j],j);
00708             result->setMedium(j,j,-1);
00709         }
00710         else {
00711             if (imed[i] < -1) {
00712                 imed[i] = addMedium(med_names[i]);
00713                 egsInformation("Using medium %s as mednum %d\n",
00714                                med_names[i].c_str(),imed[i]);
00715             }
00716             result->setMedium(j,j,imed[i]);
00717             if (rho_def[i] > 0) {
00718                 EGS_Float rrho = rho[j]/rho_def[i];
00719                 if (fabs(rrho-1) > 1e-4) {
00720                     result->setRelativeRho(j,j,rrho);
00721                 }
00722             }
00723         }
00724     }
00725     delete [] rho;
00726     delete [] imed;
00727     return result;
00728 }

00730 string EGS_DeformedXYZ::def_type = "EGS_DeformedXYZ";
00731 
00732 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::tetrahedra[] = {0,2,3,6,   0,6,3,7,   0,4,6,7,
00733                                       7,0,1,3,   7,1,0,4,   7,5,1,4
00734                                      };
00735 
00736 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::plane_order[] = {0,1,2,  0,2,3,  0,3,1,  1,3,2};
00737 
00738 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::enter_tetra1[] = {0, 3, 4, 0, 0, 2};
00739 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::enter_plane1[] = {1, 1, 1, 3, 0, 3};
00740 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::enter_tetra2[] = {2, 5, 5, 1, 3, 5};
00741 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::enter_plane2[] = {0, 0, 2, 3, 2, 2};
00742 
00743 
00744 char EGS_DeformedXYZ::tetra_data[] = {
00745     2,-1,  2,   // plane 0 in tetrahedron 0
00746     -1, 0,  1,   // plane 1 in tetrahedron 0
00747     0,-1,  3,   // plane 2 in tetrahedron 0
00748     1, 1,  4,   // plane 3 in tetrahedron 0
00749 //------------------------------------------------------------------
00750     -1, 0,  0,   // plane 0 in tetrahedron 1
00751     -1, 0,  3,   // plane 1 in tetrahedron 1
00752     -1, 0,  2,   // plane 2 in tetrahedron 1
00753     1, 1,  5,   // plane 3 in tetrahedron 1
00754 //------------------------------------------------------------------
00755     0,-1,  5,   // plane 0 in tetrahedron 2
00756     -1, 0,  1,   // plane 1 in tetrahedron 2
00757     -1, 0,  4,   // plane 2 in tetrahedron 2
00758     2, 1,  0,   // plane 3 in tetrahedron 2
00759 //------------------------------------------------------------------
00760     -1, 0,  4,   // plane 0 in tetrahedron 3
00761     0, 1,  0,   // plane 1 in tetrahedron 3
00762     -1, 0,  1,   // plane 2 in tetrahedron 3
00763     2,-1,  5,   // plane 3 in tetrahedron 3
00764 //------------------------------------------------------------------
00765     -1, 0,  3,   // plane 0 in tetrahedron 4
00766     -1, 0,  2,   // plane 1 in tetrahedron 4
00767     -1, 0,  5,   // plane 2 in tetrahedron 4
00768     1,-1,  0,   // plane 3 in tetrahedron 4
00769 //------------------------------------------------------------------
00770     0, 1,  2,   // plane 0 in tetrahedron 5
00771     -1, 0,  4,   // plane 1 in tetrahedron 5
00772     2, 1,  3,   // plane 2 in tetrahedron 5
00773     1,-1,  1    // plane 3 in tetrahedron 5
00774 };
00775 
00776 
00777 EGS_DeformedXYZ::EGS_DeformedXYZ(EGS_PlanesX *Xp, EGS_PlanesY *Yp,
00778                                  EGS_PlanesZ *Zp, const char *defFile, const string &Name) :
00779     EGS_XYZGeometry(Xp,Yp,Zp,Name), vectors(0) {
00780     setDeformations(defFile);
00781     np[0] = nx;
00782     np[1] = ny;
00783     np[2] = nz;
00784     nxyp1 = nx + ny + 1;
00785 }
00786 
00787 int EGS_DeformedXYZ::setDeformations(const char *defFile) {
00788     ifstream data(defFile,ios::binary);
00789     if (!data) {
00790         egsWarning("Failed to open deformations file %s\n",defFile);
00791         return 1;
00792     }
00793     int nvec;
00794     data.read((char *)&nvec,sizeof(int));
00795     int nneed = (nx+1)*(ny+1)*(nz+1);
00796     if (nvec != nneed) {
00797         egsWarning("Inconsistent deformations file: %d instead of %d vectors\n",
00798                    nvec,nneed);
00799         return 2;
00800     }
00801     if (!vectors) {
00802         vectors = new EGS_Vector [nvec];
00803     }
00804     float tmp[3];
00805     int i,j,k;
00806     for (j=0; j<nvec; ++j)  {
00807         data.read((char *)tmp,3*sizeof(float));
00808         if (data.fail()) {
00809             egsWarning("Error while readinf vector %d from file\n",j+1);
00810             return 3;
00811         }
00812         vectors[j] = EGS_Vector(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2]);
00813     }
00814 
00815     // add plane positions to vectors
00816     for (k=0; k<=nz; ++k) for (j=0; j<=ny; ++j) for (i=0; i<=nx; ++i) {
00817                 int index = i + j*(nx+1) + k*(nx+1)*(ny+1);
00818                 vectors[index] += EGS_Vector(xpos[i],ypos[j],zpos[k]);
00819             }
00820 
00821     for (j=0; j<24; ++j) {
00822         int i = tetrahedra[j];
00823         switch (i) {
00824         case 0:
00825             tnodes[j] = 0;
00826             break;
00827         case 1:
00828             tnodes[j] = 1;
00829             break;
00830         case 2:
00831             tnodes[j] = nx+1;
00832             break;
00833         case 3:
00834             tnodes[j] = nx+2;
00835             break;
00836         case 4:
00837             tnodes[j] = (nx+1)*(ny+1);
00838             break;
00839         case 5:
00840             tnodes[j] = (nx+1)*(ny+1)+1;
00841             break;
00842         case 6:
00843             tnodes[j] = (nx+1)*(ny+1)+nx+1;
00844             break;
00845         case 7:
00846             tnodes[j] = (nx+1)*(ny+1)+nx+2;
00847             break;
00848         }
00849     }
00850 
00851     nreg = 6*nx*ny*nz;
00852 
00853     return 0;
00854 }
00855 
00856 EGS_DeformedXYZ::~EGS_DeformedXYZ() {
00857     if (vectors) {
00858         delete [] vectors;
00859     }
00860 }
00861 
00862 string EGS_XYZRepeater::type = "EGS_XYZRepeater";
00863 
00864 EGS_XYZRepeater::EGS_XYZRepeater(EGS_Float xmin, EGS_Float xmax,
00865                                  EGS_Float ymin, EGS_Float ymax,
00866                                  EGS_Float zmin, EGS_Float zmax,
00867                                  int Nx, int Ny, int Nz,
00868                                  EGS_BaseGeometry *G,
00869                                  const string &Name) :
00870     EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), g(G), nx(Nx), ny(Ny), nz(Nz) {
00871     dx = (xmax - xmin)/nx;
00872     dxi = 1/dx;
00873     ax = -xmin*dxi;
00874     dy = (ymax - ymin)/ny;
00875     dyi = 1/dy;
00876     ay = -ymin*dyi;
00877     dz = (zmax - zmin)/nz;
00878     dzi = 1/dz;
00879     az = -zmin*dzi;
00880     EGS_PlanesX *xp;
00881     EGS_PlanesY *yp;
00882     EGS_PlanesZ *zp;
00883     xp = new EGS_PlanesX(xmin,dx,nx,"",EGS_XProjector("x-planes"));
00884     yp = new EGS_PlanesY(ymin,dy,ny,"",EGS_YProjector("y-planes"));
00885     zp = new EGS_PlanesZ(zmin,dz,nz,"",EGS_ZProjector("z-planes"));
00886     xyz = new EGS_XYZGeometry(xp,yp,zp);
00887     xyz->ref();
00888     g->ref();
00889     nxy = nx*ny;
00890     nxyz = nx*ny*nz;
00891     ng = g->regions();
00892     nreg = nxyz*ng + 1;
00893     translation = new EGS_Vector [nxyz];
00894     for (int ix=0; ix<nx; ix++)
00895         for (int iy=0; iy<ny; iy++)
00896             for (int iz=0; iz<nz; iz++)
00897                 translation[ix+iy*nx+iz*nxy] = EGS_Vector(xmin + dx*(0.5+ix),
00898                                                ymin + dy*(0.5+iy),
00899                                                zmin + dz*(0.5+iz));
00900 
00901 }
00902 
00903 EGS_XYZRepeater::~EGS_XYZRepeater() {
00904     if (!g->deref()) {
00905         delete g;
00906     }
00907     if (!xyz->deref()) {
00908         delete xyz;
00909     }
00910     delete [] translation;
00911 }
00912 
00913 void EGS_XYZRepeater::printInfo() const {
00914     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00915     egsInformation("%d repetitions between xmin=%g and xmax=%g\n",
00916                    nx,xyz->getXPositions()[0],xyz->getXPositions()[nx]);
00917     egsInformation("%d repetitions between ymin=%g and ymax=%g\n",
00918                    ny,xyz->getYPositions()[0],xyz->getYPositions()[ny]);
00919     egsInformation("%d repetitions between zmin=%g and zmax=%g\n",
00920                    nz,xyz->getZPositions()[0],xyz->getZPositions()[nz]);
00921     const char *med_name = getMediumName(med);
00922     if (med_name) {
00923         egsInformation("box is filled with %s\n",med_name);
00924     }
00925     else {
00926         egsInformation("box is filled with vacuum\n");
00927     }
00928     egsInformation("Repeated geometry:\n");
00929     g->printInfo();
00930 }
00931 
00932 void EGS_XYZGeometry::voxelizeGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00933     string gname;
00934     int err = input->getInput("voxelize geometry",gname);
00935     if (err) {
00936         return;
00937     }
00938     egsInformation("\nEGS_XYZGeometry(%s)\n",name.c_str());
00939     egsInformation("  setting media from geometry %s\n",gname.c_str());
00940     EGS_BaseGeometry *geometry = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(gname);
00941     if (!geometry) {
00942         egsInformation("  this geometry does not exist -> media will be not set.\n");
00943         return;
00944     }
00945     EGS_AffineTransform *T = EGS_AffineTransform::getTransformation(input);
00946     if (region_media) {
00947         delete [] region_media;
00948     }
00949     if (rhor) {
00950         delete [] rhor;
00951         rhor = 0;
00952     }
00953     region_media = new short [nreg];
00954     bool hrs = geometry->hasRhoScaling();
00955     if (hrs) {
00956         has_rho_scaling = true;
00957         rhor = new EGS_Float [nreg];
00958     }
00959     else {
00960         has_rho_scaling = false;
00961     }
00962     EGS_Vector v1(xp->position(0),yp->position(0),zp->position(0));
00963     EGS_Vector v2(xp->position(nx),yp->position(ny),zp->position(nz));
00964     egsInformation("  top/left/front corner   : (%g,%g,%g)\n",v1.x,v1.y,v1.z);
00965     egsInformation("  bottom/right/back corner: (%g,%g,%g)\n",v2.x,v2.y,v2.z);
00966     if (T) {
00967         egsInformation("  the above are transformed as follows before looking up media:\n");
00968         T->transform(v1);
00969         T->transform(v2);
00970         egsInformation("  top/left/front corner   : (%g,%g,%g)\n",v1.x,v1.y,v1.z);
00971         egsInformation("  bottom/right/back corner: (%g,%g,%g)\n",v2.x,v2.y,v2.z);
00972     }
00973     for (int ix=0; ix<nx; ++ix) for (int iy=0; iy<ny; iy++) for (int iz=0; iz<nz; ++iz) {
00974                 int ir = ix + iy*nx + iz*nxy;
00975                 EGS_Vector v(0.5*(xp->position(ix)+xp->position(ix+1)),
00976                              0.5*(yp->position(iy)+yp->position(iy+1)),
00977                              0.5*(zp->position(iz)+zp->position(iz+1)));
00978                 if (T) {
00979                     T->transform(v);
00980                 }
00981                 int ireg = geometry->isWhere(v);
00982                 if (ireg >= 0) {
00983                     region_media[ir] = geometry->medium(ireg);
00984                     if (hrs) {
00985                         rhor[ir] = geometry->getRelativeRho(ir);
00986                     }
00987                 }
00988                 else {
00989                     region_media[ir] = -1;
00990                     if (hrs) {
00991                         rhor[ir] = 1;
00992                     }
00993                 }
00994             }
00995     vector<string> options;
00996     options.push_back("no");
00997     options.push_back("yes");
00998     bool delete_geometry = input->getInput("delete geometry",options,0);
00999     if (delete_geometry) {
01000         if (geometry->deref() == -1) {
01001             egsInformation("  deleting geometry %s as requested\n",geometry->getName().c_str());
01002             delete geometry;
01003         }
01004         else {
01005             egsInformation("  not deleting geometry %s as requested due to remaining references\n",
01006                            geometry->getName().c_str());
01007             geometry->ref();
01008         }
01009     }
01010     egsInformation("\n");
01011 }
01012 
01013 const char *err_msg1 = "createGeometry(EGS_XYZRepeater)";
01014 
01015 #endif
01016 
01017 string EGS_NDGeometry::type = "EGS_NDGeometry";
01018 
01019 extern "C" {
01020 
01021     EGS_NDG_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry *createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
01022 #ifdef EXPLICIT_XYZ
01023         const static char *func = "createGeometry(XYZ)";
01024         string type;
01025         int is_xyz = input->getInput("type",type);
01026         if (!is_xyz && input->compare("EGS_XYZRepeater",type)) {
01027             string base,medium;
01028             vector<EGS_Float> xr, yr, zr;
01029             int err1 = input->getInput("repeated geometry",base);
01030             int err2 = input->getInput("repeat x",xr);
01031             int err3 = input->getInput("repeat y",yr);
01032             int err4 = input->getInput("repeat z",zr);
01033             int err5 = input->getInput("medium",medium);
01034             EGS_BaseGeometry *g = 0;
01035             if (err1) {
01036                 egsWarning("%s: missing 'repeated geometry' input\n",err_msg1);
01037             }
01038             else {
01039                 g = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(base);
01040                 if (!g) {
01041                     egsWarning("%s: no geometry named %s exists\n",err_msg1,
01042                                base.c_str());
01043                     err1 = 1;
01044                 }
01045             }
01046             if (err2 || xr.size() != 3) {
01047                 err1 = 1;
01048                 egsWarning("%s: wrong/missing 'repeat x' input\n",err_msg1);
01049             }
01050             if (err3 || yr.size() != 3) {
01051                 err1 = 1;
01052                 egsWarning("%s: wrong/missing 'repeat y' input\n",err_msg1);
01053             }
01054             if (err4 || zr.size() != 3) {
01055                 err1 = 1;
01056                 egsWarning("%s: wrong/missing 'repeat z' input\n",err_msg1);
01057             }
01058             if (err1) {
01059                 return 0;
01060             }
01061             EGS_Float xmin = xr[0], xmax = xr[1];
01062             int nx = (int)(xr[2]+0.1);
01063             if (xmin >= xmax || nx < 1) {
01064                 egsWarning("%s: wrong 'repeat x' input xmin=%g xmax=%g nx=%d\n",
01065                            xmin,xmax,nx);
01066                 err1 = 1;
01067             }
01068             EGS_Float ymin = yr[0], ymax = yr[1];
01069             int ny = (int)(yr[2]+0.1);
01070             if (ymin >= ymax || ny < 1) {
01071                 egsWarning("%s: wrong 'repeat y' input ymin=%g ymax=%g ny=%d\n",
01072                            ymin,ymax,ny);
01073                 err1 = 1;
01074             }
01075             EGS_Float zmin = zr[0], zmax = zr[1];
01076             int nz = (int)(zr[2]+0.1);
01077             if (zmin >= zmax || nz < 1) {
01078                 egsWarning("%s: wrong 'repeat z' input zmin=%g zmax=%g nz=%d\n",
01079                            zmin,zmax,nz);
01080                 err1 = 1;
01081             }
01082             if (err1) {
01083                 return 0;
01084             }
01085 
01086             EGS_XYZRepeater *result =
01087                 new EGS_XYZRepeater(xmin,xmax,ymin,ymax,zmin,zmax,nx,ny,nz,g);
01088             result->setName(input);
01089             if (!err5) {
01090                 result->setMedium(medium);
01091             }
01092             result->setXYZLabels(input);
01093             result->setLabels(input);
01094             return result;
01095         }
01096         else if (!is_xyz && input->compare("EGS_XYZGeometry",type)) {
01097             string dens_file, ramp_file, egsphant_file, interfile_file;
01098             int ierr1 = input->getInput("density matrix",dens_file);
01099             int ierr2 = input->getInput("ct ramp",ramp_file);
01100             int ierr3 = input->getInput("egsphant file",egsphant_file);
01101             int ierr4 = input->getInput("interfile header",interfile_file);
01102             int dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile = -1;
01103             if (!ierr1) {
01104                 dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile = 0;
01105             }
01106             else if (!ierr3) {
01107                 dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile = 1;
01108                 dens_file = egsphant_file;
01109             }
01110             else if (!ierr4) {
01111                 dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile = 2;
01112                 dens_file = interfile_file;
01113             }
01114             if (dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile >= 0 || !ierr2) {
01115                 if (dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile < 0) {
01116                     egsWarning("%s: no 'density matrix', 'egsphant file' or 'interfile header' input\n",func);
01117                     return 0;
01118                 }
01119                 if (ierr2) {
01120                     egsWarning("%s: no 'ct ramp' input\n",func);
01121                     return 0;
01122                 }
01123                 EGS_XYZGeometry *result =
01124                     EGS_XYZGeometry::constructGeometry(dens_file.c_str(),ramp_file.c_str(),dens_or_egsphant_or_interfile);
01125                 result->setName(input);
01126                 return result;
01127             }
01128             vector<EGS_Float> xpos, ypos, zpos, xslab, yslab, zslab;
01129             int ix = input->getInput("x-planes",xpos);
01130             int iy = input->getInput("y-planes",ypos);
01131             int iz = input->getInput("z-planes",zpos);
01132             int ix1 = input->getInput("x-slabs",xslab);
01133             int iy1 = input->getInput("y-slabs",yslab);
01134             int iz1 = input->getInput("z-slabs",zslab);
01135             int nx, ny, nz;
01136             if (!ix1) {
01137                 if (xslab.size() != 3) {
01138                     egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): exactly 3 inputs are required"
01139                                " when using 'x-slabs' input method\n");
01140                     ix1 = 1;
01141                 }
01142                 else {
01143                     nx = (int)(xslab[2]+0.1);
01144                     if (nx < 1) {
01145                         egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): number of slabs must be"
01146                                    " positive!\n");
01147                         ix1 = 1;
01148                     }
01149                     if (xslab[1] <= 0) {
01150                         egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): slab thickness must be"
01151                                    " positive!\n");
01152                         ix1 = 1;
01153                     }
01154                 }
01155             }
01156             if (ix && ix1) {
01157                 egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): wrong/missing 'x-planes' "
01158                            "and 'x-slabs' input\n");
01159                 return 0;
01160             }
01161             if (!iy1) {
01162                 if (yslab.size() != 3) {
01163                     egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): exactly 3 inputs are required"
01164                                " when using 'y-slabs' input method\n");
01165                     iy1 = 1;
01166                 }
01167                 else {
01168                     ny = (int)(yslab[2]+0.1);
01169                     if (ny < 1) {
01170                         egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): number of slabs must be"
01171                                    " positive!\n");
01172                         iy1 = 1;
01173                     }
01174                     if (yslab[1] <= 0) {
01175                         egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): slab thickness must be"
01176                                    " positive!\n");
01177                         iy1 = 1;
01178                     }
01179                 }
01180             }
01181             if (iy && iy1) {
01182                 egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): wrong/missing 'y-planes' "
01183                            "and 'y-slabs' input\n");
01184                 return 0;
01185             }
01186             if (!iz1) {
01187                 if (zslab.size() != 3) {
01188                     egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): exactly 3 inputs are required"
01189                                " when using 'z-slabs' input method\n");
01190                     iz1 = 1;
01191                 }
01192                 else {
01193                     nz = (int)(zslab[2]+0.1);
01194                     if (nz < 1) {
01195                         egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): number of slabs must be"
01196                                    " positive!\n");
01197                         iz1 = 1;
01198                     }
01199                     if (zslab[1] <= 0) {
01200                         egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): slab thickness must be"
01201                                    " positive!\n");
01202                         iz1 = 1;
01203                     }
01204                 }
01205             }
01206             if (iz && iz1) {
01207                 egsWarning("createGeometry(XYZ): wrong/missing 'z-planes' "
01208                            "and 'z-slabs' input\n");
01209                 return 0;
01210             }
01211             EGS_PlanesX *xp = !ix1 ?
01212                               new EGS_PlanesX(xslab[0],xslab[1],nx,"",EGS_XProjector("x-planes")) :
01213                               new EGS_PlanesX(xpos,"",EGS_XProjector("x-planes"));
01214             EGS_PlanesY *yp = !iy1 ?
01215                               new EGS_PlanesY(yslab[0],yslab[1],ny,"",EGS_YProjector("y-planes")) :
01216                               new EGS_PlanesY(ypos,"",EGS_YProjector("y-planes"));
01217             EGS_PlanesZ *zp = !iz1 ?
01218                               new EGS_PlanesZ(zslab[0],zslab[1],nz,"",EGS_ZProjector("z-planes")) :
01219                               new EGS_PlanesZ(zpos,"",EGS_ZProjector("z-planes"));
01220             EGS_XYZGeometry *result = new EGS_XYZGeometry(xp,yp,zp);
01221 
01222             if (result) {
01223                 egsWarning("**********************************************\n");
01224                 EGS_BaseGeometry *g = result;
01225                 result->setName(input);
01226                 g->setMedia(input);
01227                 result->voxelizeGeometry(input);
01228 
01229                 // labels
01230                 result->setXYZLabels(input);
01231                 g->setLabels(input);
01232             }
01233             return result;
01234         }
01235 #endif
01236         vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> dims;
01237         EGS_Input *ij;
01238         int error = 0;
01239         while ((ij = input->takeInputItem("geometry",false)) != 0) {
01240             EGS_BaseGeometry *g = EGS_BaseGeometry::createSingleGeometry(ij);
01241             if (g) {
01242                 dims.push_back(g);
01243                 g->ref();
01244             }
01245             else {
01246                 error++;
01247             }
01248             delete ij;
01249         }
01250         vector<string> gnames;
01251         int err1 = input->getInput("dimensions",gnames);
01252         if (!err1) {
01253             for (unsigned int j=0; j<gnames.size(); j++) {
01254                 EGS_BaseGeometry *g = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(gnames[j]);
01255                 if (g) {
01256                     dims.push_back(g);
01257                     g->ref();
01258                 }
01259                 else {
01260                     egsWarning("Geometry %s does not exist\n",gnames[j].c_str());
01261                     error++;
01262                 }
01263             }
01264         }
01265         if (error) {
01266             egsWarning("createGeometry(ND_Geometry): %d errors while "
01267                        "creating/geting geometries defining individual dimensions\n",error);
01268             return 0;
01269         }
01270         if (dims.size() < 2) {
01271             egsWarning("createGeometry(ND_Geometry): why do you want to "
01272                        "construct a ND geometry with a single dimension?\n");
01273             input->print(0,cerr);
01274             for (int j=0; j<gnames.size(); j++) egsWarning("dimension %d: %s\n",
01275                         j+1,gnames[j].c_str());
01276         }
01277         int n_concav = 0;
01278         for (int j=0; j<dims.size(); j++) if (!dims[j]->isConvex()) {
01279                 n_concav++;
01280             }
01281         bool is_ok = true;
01282         if (n_concav > 1) {
01283             egsWarning("createGeometry(ND_Geometry): a ND geometry can not have "
01284                        " more than one non-convex dimension, yours has %d\n",n_concav);
01285             is_ok = false;
01286         }
01287         else if (n_concav == 1) {
01288             if (dims[dims.size()-1]->isConvex()) {
01289                 egsWarning("createGeometry(ND_Geometry): the non-convex "
01290                            "dimension must be the last dimension\n");
01291                 is_ok = false;
01292             }
01293         }
01294         if (!is_ok) {
01295             for (int j=0; j<dims.size(); j++)
01296                 if (dims[j]->deref()) {
01297                     delete dims[j];
01298                 }
01299             return 0;
01300         }
01301         int hn_method=0;
01302         err1 = input->getInput("hownear method",hn_method);
01303         EGS_BaseGeometry *result;
01304         if (!err1 && hn_method == 1) {
01305             result = new EGS_NDGeometry(dims,"",false);
01306         }
01307         else {
01308             result = new EGS_NDGeometry(dims);
01309         }
01310         result->setName(input);
01311         result->setMedia(input);
01312         result->setLabels(input);
01313         return result;
01314     }

01317     void EGS_XYZGeometry::setXYZLabels(EGS_Input *input) {
01318 
01319         // x,y,z labels
01320         string inp;
01321         int err;
01322 
01323         err = input->getInput("set x label", inp);
01324         if (!err) {
01325             xp->setLabels(inp);
01326         }
01327 
01328         err = input->getInput("set y label", inp);
01329         if (!err) {
01330             yp->setLabels(inp);
01331         }
01332 
01333         err = input->getInput("set z label", inp);
01334         if (!err) {
01335             zp->setLabels(inp);
01336         }
01337     }

01339 
01340     int EGS_NDGeometry::ndRegions(int r, int dim, int dimk, int k, vector<int> &regs) {
01341 
01342         // skip looping over selected dimension
01343         if (dim == dimk) {
01344             r += k*n[dimk];
01345             if (dim == N-1) {
01346                 regs.push_back(r);
01347             }
01348             else {
01349                 ndRegions(r, dim+1, dimk, k, regs);
01350             }
01351         }
01352 
01353         // last dimension: end recursion and record global region number
01354         else if (dim == N-1) {
01355             for (int j=0; j<g[dim]->regions(); j++) {
01356                 regs.push_back(r+j*n[dim]);
01357             }
01358         }
01359 
01360         // keep collecting by recursion
01361         else {
01362             for (int j=0; j<g[dim]->regions(); j++) {
01363                 ndRegions(r + j*n[dim], dim+1, dimk, k, regs);
01364             }
01365         }
01366     }
01367 
01368 
01369     void EGS_NDGeometry::getLabelRegions(const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
01370 
01371         // label defined in the sub-geometries
01372         vector<int> local_regs;
01373         for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
01374             local_regs.clear();
01375             if (g[i]) {
01376                 g[i]->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01377             }
01378             if (local_regs.size() == 0) {
01379                 continue;
01380             }
01381 
01382             // recurse to collect all global regions comprised in each local region
01383             for (int j=0; j<local_regs.size(); j++) {
01384                 ndRegions(0, 0, i, local_regs[j], regs);
01385             }
01386         }
01387 
01388         // label defined in self (nd input block)
01389         EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
01390 
01391     }
01392 
01393 
01394     void EGS_XYZGeometry::getLabelRegions(const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
01395 
01396         vector<int> local_regs;
01397 
01398         // x plane labels
01399         local_regs.clear();
01400         xp->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01401         for (int i=0; i<local_regs.size(); i++) {
01402             for (int j=0; j<ny; j++) {
01403                 for (int k=0; k<nz; k++) {
01404                     regs.push_back(local_regs[i] + nx*j + nxy*k);
01405                 }
01406             }
01407         }
01408 
01409         // y plane labels
01410         local_regs.clear();
01411         yp->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01412         for (int j=0; j<local_regs.size(); j++) {
01413             for (int i=0; i<nx; i++) {
01414                 for (int k=0; k<nz; k++) {
01415                     regs.push_back(i + nx*local_regs[j] + nxy*k);
01416                 }
01417             }
01418         }
01419 
01420         // z plane labels
01421         local_regs.clear();
01422         zp->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01423         for (int k=0; k<local_regs.size(); k++) {
01424             for (int i=0; i<nx; i++) {
01425                 for (int j=0; j<ny; j++) {
01426                     regs.push_back(i + nx*j + nxy*local_regs[k]);
01427                 }
01428             }
01429         }
01430 
01431         // label defined in self (xyz input block)
01432         EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
01433 
01434     }

01436 
01437     void EGS_XYZRepeater::getLabelRegions(const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
01438 
01439         vector<int> local_regs;
01440 
01441         // label in repeated geometry
01442         local_regs.clear();
01443         g->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01444         for (int i=0; i<nx; i++) {
01445             for (int j=0; j<ny; j++) {
01446                 for (int k=0; k<nz; k++) {
01447                     for (int r=0; r<local_regs.size(); r++) {
01448                         regs.push_back(ng*(i + nx*j + nxy*k) + local_regs[r]);
01449                     }
01450                 }
01451             }
01452         }
01453 
01454         // x plane labels
01455         local_regs.clear();
01456         xyz->getXLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01457         for (int i=0; i<local_regs.size(); i++) {
01458             for (int j=0; j<ny; j++) {
01459                 for (int k=0; k<nz; k++) {
01460                     for (int r=0; r<ng; r++) {
01461                         regs.push_back(ng*(local_regs[i] + nx*j + nxy*k) + r);
01462                     }
01463                 }
01464             }
01465         }
01466 
01467         // y plane labels
01468         local_regs.clear();
01469         xyz->getYLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01470         for (int j=0; j<local_regs.size(); j++) {
01471             for (int i=0; i<nx; i++) {
01472                 for (int k=0; k<nz; k++) {
01473                     for (int r=0; r<ng; r++) {
01474                         regs.push_back(ng*(i + nx*local_regs[j] + nxy*k) + r);
01475                     }
01476                 }
01477             }
01478         }
01479 
01480         // z plane labels
01481         local_regs.clear();
01482         xyz->getZLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
01483         for (int k=0; k<local_regs.size(); k++) {
01484             for (int i=0; i<nx; i++) {
01485                 for (int j=0; j<ny; j++) {
01486                     for (int r=0; r<ng; r++) {
01487                         regs.push_back(ng*(i + nx*j + nxy*local_regs[k]) + r);
01488                     }
01489                 }
01490             }
01491         }
01492 
01493         // label defined in self (repeater input block)
01494         EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
01495 
01496     }
